heading: HR02249
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT TO EXPEDITIOUSLY ADDRESS THE RAPID SPIKES ON INFLATION AND THE EFFECTS OF THE SAME TO THE GENERAL POPULATION, IN LIEU OF THE RESULTS OF THE LATEST SWS SURVEY REVEALING THAT FILIPINOS WHO CONSIDER THEMSELVES AS POOR IS AT ITS HIGHEST LEVEL SINCE 2014
status: Pending with the Committee on WAYS AND MEANS since 2019-01-29
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02249
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT TO EXPEDITIOUSLY ADDRESS THE RAPID SPIKES ON INFLATION AND THE EFFECTS OF THE SAME TO THE GENERAL POPULATION, IN LIEU OF THE RESULTS OF THE LATEST SWS SURVEY REVEALING THAT FILIPINOS WHO CONSIDER THEMSELVES AS POOR IS AT ITS HIGHEST LEVEL SINCE 2014
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-10-11
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS ON 2019-01-29
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO ECONOMIC AFFAIRS on 2018-11-12;
